metadata.synopsis:
Full context from combat - we’d like to request some voicebarks for Captain Therezzyn combat in Creche

Therezzyn’s second turn (first one she calls for the guards)

Therezzyn: You die here and by my sword, intruder!

Therezzyn’s third turn

Therezzyn: Die already! I won’t be embarrassed in front of my troops again!
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to the creche > captain's quarters > start combat

0.speaker: Kith'rak Therezzyn
0.text: You will not embarrass me anymore!
